about_the_game:
Note that songs included are their respective abridged versions.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

This Anime Music Pack includes a total of 11 songs coming from the original Anime of DRAGON BALL, DRAGON BALL Z, and even DRAGON BALL GT!

The ultimate dream for every DRAGON BALL fan and a real treat for the ears!

Songs included:
- BOKUTACHIWA TENSHIDATTA
- CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA
- DAN DAN KOKORO HIKARETEKU
- DETEKOI TOBIKIRI ZENKAI POWER
- KYOUFUNO GINYUU TOKUSENTAI
- MAKAFUSHIGI ADVENTURE
- NEW HERO TOUJOU
- PROLOGUE & SUBTITLE 1
- ROMANTIC AGERUYO
- SOLID STATE SCOUTER
- WE GOTTA POWER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon RX 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
